title: Data Governance Specialist - Remote
description:
About the job
En BETWEEN apostamos por el mejor talento dentro del sector tecnol√≥gico. Nos involucramos en una gran variedad de proyectos punteros, trabajando con las √∫ltimas tecnolog√≠as. Actualmente en BETWEEN contamos con un equipo de m√°s de 1000 personas.

Trabajamos en √°mbitos como BI, IoT, Big Data e I+D. En el √°rea de Operaciones implantamos proyectos de Service Desk, Infraestructuras IT y proyectos Cloud, entre otros.

Buscamos un/a Data Governance Specialist para liderar la implementaci√≥n de estrategias de gobernanza de datos en un entorno internacional, impulsando la calidad, seguridad y cumplimiento normativo en la gesti√≥n de datos.

¬øQu√© har√©? Estas ser√°n tus principales responsabilidades:

Definir y establecer pol√≠ticas de gobernanza de datos a nivel corporativo.
Desarrollar y mantener el marco de gesti√≥n de la calidad de los datos, asegurando consistencia y precisi√≥n.
Colaborar con equipos de IT y negocio para implementar pr√°cticas de data governance en toda la organizaci√≥n.
Garantizar el cumplimiento de normativas de protecci√≥n de datos (GDPR, CCPA, etc.).
Liderar iniciativas para la clasificaci√≥n y catalogaci√≥n de datos, impulsando una gesti√≥n eficiente.
Capacitar a equipos internos en pol√≠ticas y procedimientos de gobernanza de datos.
Realizar auditor√≠as peri√≥dicas para identificar riesgos y asegurar la alineaci√≥n con est√°ndares de seguridad y calidad de datos.
D√≠a a d√≠a 100% en ingl√©s.


¬øC√≥mo lo har√©?

Tendr√°s horario flexible y contrato indefinido.
Trabajar√°s en remoto desde cualquier punto de Espa√±a. En caso de acordar alguna visita a oficina, ser√° a Barcelona (Poblenou). 
Tendr√°s un PC y los perif√©ricos necesarios para el desarrollo de tu trabajo.
Podr√°s trabajar desde casa de cliente, nuestras oficinas de Barcelona en el 22@, los Hubs Tecnol√≥gicos o en el resto de las oficinas.
Trabajar√°s en un entorno internacional.


Si eres BETWEENER obtendr√°s estos beneficios:

Seguro m√©dico con Sanitas.
Dispondr√°s de oportunidades de formaci√≥n y desarrollo profesional: Idiomas, cursos en Udemy, Certificaciones, Programa The Power Business School y Bootcamps especializados (Agile, DevOps, IA & Big Data, Ciberseguridad, etc.).
Contar√°s con un equipo de Talento que te acompa√±ar√° durante toda tu experiencia con nosotros. ¬°Haremos un caf√© una vez al mes! As√≠, mantendremos el contacto.
Pondremos a tu disposici√≥n un amplio abanico de retos y proyectos acordes con tus objetivos personales y profesionales.
Posibilidad de elegir c√≥mo obtener parte de tu salario gracias a las ventajas fiscales de nuestra Retribuci√≥n Flexible (Ticket restaurant, Ticket transporte, Ticket guarder√≠a).
Descuentos para acceder a centros de Fitness con Gympass.
Acceso a nuestro Club de Descuentos: Inspiring Benefits.
En BETWEEN nos gusta mucho hacer networking, por lo que te invitaremos a participar en todos estos eventos ¬°y m√°s!: las BETWEEN Nights, torneos deportivos, Black Mamba Race, viernes de vermut, juegos de mesa, etc.
Programa remunerado de recomendaci√≥n de Talento.
En BETWEEN, la igualdad de oportunidades es uno de nuestros valores. Nuestro compromiso es contratar al mejor talento independientemente de su religi√≥n, sexo, edad y personas con otras capacidades y promover su desarrollo profesional y personal.


Requisitos:

M√≠nimos:

Formaci√≥n: Grado en Ingenier√≠a Inform√°tica, Sistemas de Informaci√≥n o campo relacionado.
Experiencia m√≠nima: 3-5 a√±os en gobernanza de datos o gesti√≥n de calidad de datos.
Conocimientos t√©cnicos: Experiencia en herramientas de gesti√≥n de datos (Collibra, Informatica, Talend), y en la implementaci√≥n de marcos normativos (GDPR, CCPA).
Habilidades: Excelentes capacidades de comunicaci√≥n y liderazgo, capacidad de trabajo en entornos din√°micos e internacionales.
Idiomas: Ingl√©s avanzado. Franc√©s valorable.


Valorables:

Certificaci√≥n en Data Governance o Data Management (CDMP, DGSP).
Experiencia en el sector energ√©tico o en proyectos de transformaci√≥n digital.
Idiomas: Franc√©s valorable.

title: Customer Insights & CRM Analyst
description:
About the job
Astara: Global Mobility for a World on the Move üöÄ

At Astara, we‚Äôve been redefining mobility for over 40 years, connecting people with cutting-edge technology and staying one step ahead. Today, with operations in 19 countries, annual revenues exceeding 5 billion euros, and a diverse team of 3,000+ people from 50 nationalities, we lead the way in automotive distribution and innovative mobility services. We are committed to sustainability, offering environmentally friendly solutions for a cleaner and more responsible future.

Our portfolio goes far beyond vehicles: we offer flexible mobility solutions including ownership, subscription, and B2B/B2C services, all powered by our own digital platform. With a culture that values diversity and talent, Astara offers a collaborative, inclusive environment where you can grow and make an impact.

Are you ready to join a company driving the future of mobility? At Astara, your ideas and talent move us forward!

The Role

We are looking for a dynamic and detail-oriented Customer Insights & CRM Analyst to join our global team. In this role, you will leverage data analytics and CRM processes to uncover actionable insights, improve customer engagement strategies, and drive business growth across multiple markets. You‚Äôll collaborate with international teams, ensuring consistency and excellence in reporting, and play a vital role in the evolution of our CRM platform.

Main Functions/Responsibilities

Analyze CRM process and data to identify trends, customer behaviors and opportunities for growth that can be translated into actionable business strategies.
Ensure CRM data quality and accuracy through regular validation and cleaning processes.
Participate in the design and implement new KPIs and Power BI dashboards to meet evolving reporting requirements. 
Identify and design new features for the evolution of the CRM platform.
Optimize sales and aftersales processes by identifying business opportunities through data insights

Professional Experience/Qualifications

Fluent in English (C1+) and capable of working in a global environment. 
2-3 years in a similar role focusing on customer insights, CRM analytics, or data insights. 
Strong analytical skills.
Experience working with international teams and managing multiple projects simultaneously.
Ability to clearly communicate processes, strategies, and general requirements to both internal and external stakeholders.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to evolving technologies and methodologies

If you're driven by the power of data to craft meaningful experiences and make a tangible impact on customer relationships, we want you to be part of our forward-thinking team. Together, we'll shape the next generation of CRM and customer engagement.

#DataImpact #CustomerExperienceRevolution #InnovateWithData #CustomerEngagementExcellence #TransformativeInsights #FutureOfCustomerRelations #DataDrivenSuccess

Are you ready to embrace the challenge?

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
About the job
Intellectsoft is a software development company delivering innovative solutions since 2007. We operate across North America, Latin America, the Nordic region, the UK, and Europe.We specialize in industries like Fintech, Healthcare, EdTech, Construction, Hospitality, and more, partnering with startups, mid-sized businesses, and Fortune 500 companies to drive growth and scalability. Our clients include Jaguar Motors, Universal Pictures, Harley-Davidson, Qualcomm, and London Stock Exchange.Together, our team delivers solutions that make a difference. Learn more at www.intellectsoft.net

The product is an AI-powered platform that helps businesses make better decisions and work more efficiently. It uses advanced analytics and machine learning to analyze large amounts of data and provide useful insights and predictions. The platform is widely used in various industries, including healthcare, to optimize processes, improve customer experiences, and support innovation. It integrates easily with existing systems, making it easier for teams to make quick, data-driven decisions.

Requirements

4+ years of professional experience, including 2+ years of data engineering with Apache Spark and SQL
Proficiency in Python for data processing and automation
Knowledge of PySpark, distributed computing, analytical databases and other big data technologies
Expertise in designing and managing ETL pipelines and distributed data processing frameworks
Strong knowledge of database systems, data modeling, and analytical databases
Hands-on experience with workflow orchestration tools such as Apache Airflow
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure
Solid understanding of software development lifecycles, including coding standards, version control, and testing

Nice to have skills

Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
Familiarity with the data science and machine learning development process
Understanding of Machine Learning pipelines or frameworks

Responsibilities

Design and build highly reliable and scalable data pipelines using PySpark and big data technologies
Collaborate with the data science team to develop new features that enhance model accuracy and performance
Create standardized data models to improve consistency across various deployments
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in existing ETL pipelines and optimize workflows
Conduct POCs to evaluate new technologies and integrate additional data sources
Follow and promote best practices for software development, ensuring high-quality solutions that meet requirements and deadlines
Document development updates and maintain clear technical documentation


Benefits

35 paid absence days per year for work-life balance of each specialist + 1 additional day for each following year of cooperation with the company
Up to 15 unused absence days can be add to income after 12 month of cooperation
Health insurance for you
Depreciation coverage for personal laptop usage for project needs
Udemy courses of your choice
Regular soft-skills trainings
Excellence –°enters meetups

title: Data Scientist
description:
About the job
The Team

The Workforce Solutions Data Science team spearheads the creation of innovative products by developing core intellectual property through a scientific, research-driven approach. We seek talented individuals eager to enhance our capabilities and drive significant customer value through the expansion of our data science IP.

The role sits within a cross-functional squad including Data Scientists, AI Engineers, and Ontologists. Each squad is responsible for the complete lifecycle of data science models‚Äîfrom concept and development through to deployment via APIs. This team specialises in building and maintaining models related to Pearson‚Äôs core occupation and skill ontologies, including data extraction and normalisation, analytics and recommendation systems. Positioned within Engineering, the squad collaborates closely with the Product team to ensure that the solutions align with strategic objectives and product priorities.

The Role

Reporting to the Lead Data Scientist, you will support the development and delivery of data science models. You will play a key role in maintaining high standards of data quality and model validation. Additionally, you will contribute to extending and refining existing data pipelines and models.

Key Responsibilities

Data Manipulation: Utilise SQL to interact with Athena databases, querying and manipulating large datasets.
Advanced Analytical Implementation: Implement analytical techniques and experimental methods to discover data patterns and develop classification, prediction, and optimisation models, driving business outcomes.
Model Development Support: Participate in the model development lifecycle from conception through deployment via APIs, focusing on creating scalable, efficient, and purpose-fit models.
Data Pipeline Maintenance: Collaborate with team members to maintain, track, and evaluate data pipelines and deployed models, with a strong emphasis on quality assurance processes to ensure accurate and reliable outputs that drive continuous improvement.
Generative AI Application: Leverage knowledge of Language Model Models (LLMs) to apply generative AI, developing innovative solutions that enhance data quality and creativity.
API Development & Maintenance: Design, develop, and maintain robust REST APIs for model deployment, ensuring efficient and reliable integration with internal and external systems.
Qualitative Research and Analysis: Perform research, data analysis, and visualisation in the areas of future of work, workforce analytics, skills, and education, contributing to targeted outcomes.
Collaboration with Product and Customer Teams: Engage with product and customer teams to understand client issues and ensure solutions deliver substantial value.

Experience Overview

Data Science Experience: 1+ years in data science, with a robust background in machine learning or data analytics. Demonstrated proficiency in data-driven analysis and model development. Holds a formal qualification in Data Science, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Statistics, or a related field.
Machine Learning and Statistical Models: Strong foundational skills in applied machine learning and statistical models, including NLP, linear/logistic regression, time series analysis, and recommender systems.
Python Proficiency: Solid experience in Python for developing data processing tasks, conducting analyses, and deploying machine learning models. Familiarity with building and maintaining REST APIs is a plus.
SQL and Database Management: Competent in performing SQL queries for effective data extraction, manipulation, and analysis, combined with a sound understanding of database design principles. Familiar with Athena and RDBMS such as PostgreSQL.
AWS and Cloud Technologies: Proven abilities in using AWS to build and optimize data pipelines, with practical experience in deploying data models and managing large datasets in a cloud environment.
Generative AI: Foundational understanding of generative AI concepts, with the ability to apply these technologies to improve data quality, model development and validation.
Professional fluency in English is essential

 At Pearson we ‚Äòadd life to a lifetime of learning‚Äô so everyone can realise the life they imagine. We do this by creating vibrant and enriching learning experiences designed for real-life impact. 

Pearson is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Who We Are

At Pearson, our purpose is simple: to help people realize the life they imagine through learning. We believe that every learning opportunity is a chance for a personal breakthrough. We are the world's lifelong learning company. For us, learning isn't just what we do. It's who we are. To learn more: We are Pearson.

Pearson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer and a member of E-Verify. We want a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. All employment decisions are based on qualifications, merit and business need. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status or any other group protected by law. We strive for a workforce that reflects the diversity of our communities.

If you are an individual with a disability and are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career site as a result of your disability, you may request reasonable accommodations by emailing TalentExperienceGlobalTeam@grp.pearson.com.

Note that the information you provide will stay confidential and will be stored securely. It will not be seen by those involved in making decisions as part of the recruitment process.

title: Data Scientist IA Generativa
description:

 Comunicar los resultados y las conclusiones de los modelos de IA generativa multimodal a audiencias no t√©cnicas, utilizando visualizaciones y explicaciones claras y concisas para que puedan comprender la informaci√≥n.

Formaci√≥n continua: competencias t√©cnicas, transversales y de idiomas. Contamos con acceso a certificaciones, formaciones de los principales Partners Tecnol√≥gicos, plataformas online y ¬°mucho m√°s!

Y lo m√°s importante‚Ä¶Tienes la posibilidad de desarrollar tu carrera profesional con nosotros: Crearemos juntos un plan de carrera personalizado. Te formar√°s, marcaremos objetivos y llevaremos a cabo un seguimiento para asegurarnos de que lo conseguimos juntos. Escuchamos tus prioridades y luchamos por ellas.

¬°Aqu√≠ tu voz importa! ¬°√önete a nosotros y s√© parte de algo m√°s!

The World Is How We Shape It

Adquirimos el compromiso de respetar la diversidad, creando un ambiente de trabajo inclusivo y aplicando pol√≠ticas que favorezcan la inclusi√≥n y promuevan el respeto social y cultural en cuestiones de g√©nero, edad, funcional, orientaci√≥n sexual y religi√≥n con igualdad de oportunidades.
